document_data.name: Runhave's Masks
document_data.mainbody: '''Runhave's Masks''' was a [[festhall]] and tavern in the [[Amn]]ian city of [[Esmeltaran]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The festhall was found in northeastern Esmeltaran.
document_data.Services: The place provided quite excellent services at surprisingly cheap prices. The staff wore masks as they worked, and on occasion drugged, kidnapped, and sold foreign guests to [[drow]] who operated beneath the city.
